issue.title: EF and vector search

type.name: Epic
type.description: It's a high-level objective or feature that requires multiple steps to complete and often spans several sprints or iterations.

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
This issue tracks various opportunities for improving the EF experience with vector search.

/cc @SamMonoRT @luisquintanilla @stephentoub

issue.title: Implement support for SQL Server VECTOR_DISTANCE()

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
Note: this does not include  [`VECTOR_SEARCH[]`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/functions/vector-search-transact-sql?view=sql-server-ver17) translation support (as opposed to [`VECTOR_DISTANCE()`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/functions/vector-distance-transact-sql?view=sql-server-ver17) which is included); this is tracked by #36384.

Closes #34659

body: Note: splitting off [`VECTOR_SEARCH[]`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/functions/vector-search-transact-sql?view=sql-server-ver17) translation support (as opposed to [`VECTOR_DISTANCE()`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/functions/vector-distance-transact-sql?view=sql-server-ver17)) to #36384.
